bill_title: prohibit the state from using federal funds for certain state highway maps.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit the state from using federal funds for certain state highway maps. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The State of South Dakota may not accept or use any federal funds for the purposes of printing or distributing state highway maps for the traveling public. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
